alert.note: Alert for Aransas Islands; Bee; Calhoun Islands; Coastal Aransas; Coastal Calhoun; Coastal Refugio; Coastal San Patricio; Goliad; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Inland San Patricio; Nueces Islands; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 1:38AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Aransas, southern Calhoun, northeastern San Patricio, south central Victoria, southeastern Goliad, Refugio and southeastern Bee Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 138 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of McFaddin to 6 miles southwest of Bonnie View. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rockport, Port Aransas, Refugio, Woodsboro, Seadrift, McFaddin, Lamar, Ingleside, Aransas Pass, Bayside, Quintana, Palm Harbor, Key Allegro, Long Mott, Copano Village, Green Lake, Bonnie View, Holiday Beach, Tivoli and Aransas National Wildlife Refuge. This includes the following highways... US Highway 181 near mile marker 608. US Highway 183 between mile markers 658 and 668. US Highway 77 between mile markers 590 and 642. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
